ARABIC: وَنُوحًا إِذْ نَادَىٰ مِن قَبْلُ فَٱسْتَجَبْنَا لَهُۥ فَنَجَّيْنَٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلْكَرْبِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And Nuh, when he called out before and We responded to him and rescued him and his family from the terrible plight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Remember Noah when he called to Us before this. We heard him and saved him and those with him from great distress;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We bestowed the same favour upon Noah. Recall, when he cried to Us before; We accepted his prayer and delivered him and his household from the great distress
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We answered the prayer of Noah who had prayed to Us before and saved him and his followers from the great disaster.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And before this when Nooh called Us – We therefore heard his prayer and rescued him and his household from the great calamity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And (remember) Nuh, when he cried (to Us) aforetime. We answered to his invocation and saved him and his family from the great distress.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Nuh, when he cried aforetime, so We answered him, and delivered him and his followers from the great calamity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And Noah -- when he called before, and We answered him, and delivered him and his people from the great distress,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And Noah, when he cried of old, We heard his prayer and saved him and his household from the great affliction.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Before him Noah cried out to Us, and We heard his prayer. We saved him and all his household from a great distress.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Nuh! recall what time he cried aforetime; so we answered him and delivered him and his house hold from a calamity mighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And before that Noah, when he called out, We responded to him and delivered him and his family from the great agony.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Remember) Noah, when he cried (to Us) aforetime: We listened to his (prayer) and delivered him and his family from great distress.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And (remember) Nuh (Noah), when he cried (to Us) aforetime. We listened to his invocation and saved him and his family from great distress.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And (remember) Noah, when he supplicated to Us, We answered him, and We saved him and his nation from great distress,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And Noah, when he called before. So We answered him, and delivered him and his family from the great disaster.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [mention] Noah, when he called [to Allah] before [that time], so We responded to him and saved him and his family from the great flood.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:76] And, mention, Noah (what follows [Nūhan] substitutes for it) when he called, when he supplicated [to God] against his people — with the words My Lord, do not leave [upon the earth any inhabitant from among the disbelievers] … to the end [of the verse, Q. 71:26], before, that is, before [the time of] Abraham and Lot. And We responded to him, and delivered him and his people, who were in the Ark with him, from the great agony, namely, [from] drowning and his people’s denial of him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Noah) We also honoured him with prophethood, (when he cried) when he prayed to his Lord to destroy his people (of old) before Lot, (We heard his prayer and saved him and his household) as well as those who believed in him (from the great affliction) i.e. from drowning.
